poster: T e e j รก y   XD
title: why is the new client taking so long to update?
body: For me and some of my friends the new client is still 3% at one hour and some of my other friends updated them at 2 mins. i just dont understand!!

replies.body: You might end up running into an error at this point.  At 3%, your patcher is trying to scan your game files but something might be blocking that.  I recommend going over the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that access is being allowed.  Hope this helps!
